examples.example: 我一直认为只要努力就一定会有收获。

translate.english: I always think that as long as one works hard, there will definitely be gains.

examples.example: 我认为生活中处处都有美好，只要我们善于发现。

translate.english: I think there is beauty everywhere in life, as long as we are good at discovering.

examples.example: 我认为保持乐观积极的心态能让我们更好地面对生活中的挑战。

translate.english: I think maintaining an optimistic and positive attitude can enable us to better face the challenges in life.
